{"metadata":{"objective":"Rebutting an argument","lastStepAudioPath":""},"steps":[{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>You are</strong></span> a law reporter summarizing the case of Aplomb versus Esprit for your readers.<br /><br />You have heard Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument and his evidence; now it&#39;s time to hear from Ms. Esprit.<br /><br /><strong><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\">Your next step</span></strong> is understand what makes a good rebuttal, and then listen to what Ms. Esprit has to say.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Try it!</strong></span><br /><br /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;\">Note for screen readers: Press Alt + 1 , or option + 1 on Mac, to open the try it information box in a new window and access information needed to answer some of the questions. In the content, this needed information is described as being in the box or table to the right.</span></span></p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\"><tbody><tr><td><strong>Neighbor sues neighbor</strong><br /><br />Mr. Aplomb says, &quot;Ms. Esprit should not create disturbances with loud parties and noisy animals that make it impossible for me to sleep, because it is reasonable to expect peace and quiet in your own house.&quot;</td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Esprit argues back"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>A <strong>rebuttal</strong> (or <strong>counter-argument</strong>) is a type of argument used to challenge the original argument.&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows three stages of an argument: the argument, the rebuttal, and the counter-rebuttal.   In the argument stage, Mr. Aplomb makes his argument.  In the rebuttal stage, Ms. Esprit attacks the argument. In the counter-rebuttal stage, Mr. Aplomb attacks the rebuttal and supports the argument.  This mini-lesson is about the rebuttal stage in which Ms. Esprit attacks Mr. Aplomb's argument.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"Preparing a rebuttal"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Here are three strategies you can use to rebut an argument:&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p><ul><li>If the argument is based on <strong>facts or data</strong>, point out flaws or gaps in the information.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the argument is based on <strong>logic</strong>, attack the logic.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the argument is based on <strong>expert opinion</strong>, try to discredit it.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul><p>You can also attack the reasons for the argument (the <em>becaus</em>e).<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><br />&nbsp;</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This argument uses <strong>data</strong> as evidence:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Lively Cola is the best cola because of its good taste and low price. </span></p><p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">In recent tests,&nbsp;85% of those surveyed said they bought Lively Cola because it was cheap and delicious.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>What is the flaw or gap in the data?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_c0d08414-011a-c51b-c085-5bb2f0de3097\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_c0d0...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This argument presents <strong>logical evidence</strong>:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">We need to ban texting while driving because it is so dangerous. </span></p><p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">If you don&#39;t favor this ban, you clearly don&#39;t care about the lives of the children who are hurt in texting-related car accidents each year.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>What is the problem with the logic of the evidence?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_37c8ee26-23c1-64d0-4237-44714e9e558c\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_37c8...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>This argument offers an <strong>expert opinion</strong> as evidence:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">We need to eliminate the use of pesticides in agriculture because they can cause birth defects.&nbsp; &nbsp; </span></p><p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Doctor Theresa Moran, a world-famous podiatrist, has expressed her support for banning certain pesticides.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How can you discredit the expert opinion given here?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_c6ff4bb5-2e54-8073-8548-5abac14ea8ac\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_c6ff...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>To prepare her rebuttal, Ms. Esprit starts by looking for weaknesses in the evidence that Mr. Aplomb is using to support his argument.&nbsp;&nbsp; Mr. Aplomb&#39;s evidence is in the box to the right.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Ms. Esprit's rebuttal"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Local ordinances prohibit making noises that are above a certain decibel level.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>What gaps in the data can Ms. Esprit point to?&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_8fa9eed0-eff0-d389-b263-5b6071a2d78b\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_8fa9...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">When people buy property they expect to be able to enjoy it.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>What logical weakness can Ms. Esprit find in this argument?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_a90616aa-0f63-0801-b94f-6a5464aa3b17\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_a906...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">According to the respected Doctor Kronkheit, medical science shows that if people do not get enough sleep, they cannot function in their daily lives.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>To discredit Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument, Ms. Esprit does some research of her own.&nbsp; Which piece of expert opinion can she use to rebut Mr. Aplomb&#39;s evidence?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_bd312002-d923-c45c-449b-f451b20333a1\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_bd31...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Next, Ms. Esprit tries to attack Mr. Aplomb&#39;s reasons for his argument (the <em>because</em>).<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Mr. Aplomb&#39;s reason for his argument:</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">It is reasonable to expect peace and quiet in your own house.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which would be a reasonable rebuttal that Ms. Esprit could make to this reason?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_b30483c3-4dc0-151d-68f2-49404e6c9633\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_b304...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Ms. Esprit could look for additional evidence to support her rebuttal, but she is satisfied with what she has.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Ms. Esprit can rebut Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument in a few ways:</p><ul style=\"padding-left:15px;\"><li>She can point to flaws or weaknesses in evidence.</li><li>She can introduce new evidence that contradicts Mr. Aplomb&#39;s evidence.</li><li>She can attack the logic of Mr. Aplomb&#39;s claim or reason.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:</span><br /><br />You do not have the right to sleep without being disturbed, because the noise ordinance applies only after midnight on weekdays and after 1:00 a.m. on weekends.&nbsp; Furthermore, other people have the right to enjoy their property, too.&nbsp; In addition, medical authorities such as the esteemed Dr. Boop say that while sleep is one component of good health, enjoying yourself and having fun is also essential to good health.&nbsp; Finally, living in a community involves some noise, such as lawnmowers, airplanes overhead, and children playing.&nbsp; It is not reasonable to expect a noise-free environment.</td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Putting it all together"}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_a90616aa-0f63-0801-b94f-6a5464aa3b17":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"The right to enjoy your property goes both ways.  Other people have the right to enjoy their property, too.","fixed":false},{"text":"Mr. Aplomb is behind on his mortgage payments.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not a flaw in logic.    Whether or not Mr. Aplomb is up-to-date on his mortgage payments does not impact his ownership."},{"fixed":false,"text":"Mr. Aplomb could reduce the noise he hears by insulating his house better.","incFeedback":"The issue of insulation does not address the question of whether ownership provides certain rights."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This is a gap in Mr. Aplomb's logic.  Property ownership means that <i>all</i> property owners have the right to enjoy their property."},"mc_bd312002-d923-c45c-449b-f451b20333a1":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Other medical authorities, such as the esteemed Dr. Boop, say that while sleep is one component of good health, enjoying yourself and having fun is also essential to good health.","fixed":false},{"text":"Professor Daniel Kerrigan has stated that people sometimes need less sleep as they get older.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is irrelevant to whether Mr. Aplomb in particular is getting enough sleep."},{"fixed":false,"text":"The Surgeon General of the United States has said that drinking warm milk before bed can help you get to sleep.","incFeedback":"This does not address the question of whether you need enough sleep to function properly."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This rebuttal seeks to show that Mr. Aplomb's need for sleep is not more important than Ms. Esprit's need for fun (and the noise that goes with it)."},"mc_b30483c3-4dc0-151d-68f2-49404e6c9633":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":2,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Really?  Living in a community always involves some noise, such as lawnmowers, airplanes overhead, and children playing.  It is not reasonable to expect a noise-free environment.","fixed":false},{"text":"The next thing you know, Mr. Aplomb will be asking us to kill all the wildlife so that he can live in a noise-free environment.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This would not be an effective rebuttal.  It is anticipating what could happen, not addressing the question of what’s reasonable to expect."},{"fixed":false,"text":"I have been living in my house longer than Mr. Aplomb has been living in his. He saw the Vietnamese pot-bellied pigs, talking Amazon parrots, and braying donkeys in my yard before he bought his house.  He knew they would make noise, but he bought the house anyway.  Now he wants me to get rid of my pets.  Mr. Aplomb should move out of the neighborhood, and my animals should stay right where they are.","incFeedback":"This is not an effective rebuttal.  Mr. Aplomb is not suggesting that Ms. Esprit get rid of her animals.  And Ms. Esprit's rights are not more important than Mr. Aplomb's."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This is a reasonable rebuttal.  It is not realistic to expect complete silence when you live in a neighborhood with other people."},"mc_c0d08414-011a-c51b-c085-5bb2f0de3097":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":2,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"The evidence does not mention how many people took the survey, who conducted the survey, or when the survey was conducted.","fixed":false},{"text":"No one I know buys Lively Cola, which means that this survey was probably flawed.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This does not directly attack the flaws or gaps in the evidence."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This evidence may be heavily biased, out of date, or the sample size may be too small to be relevant.","prompt":""},"mc_37c8ee26-23c1-64d0-4237-44714e9e558c":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":2,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"This evidence is not logical.  You can be opposed to the ban on texting while driving <i>and</i> care about children's lives.","fixed":false},{"text":"This evidence is not logical.  There is no logical connection between people who text while driving and the number of accidents that occur in the United States each year.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not a flaw in the logic.   It <b>does</b> follow logically that texting while driving is dangerous."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"There is no direct logical connection between caring about children's lives and the ban on texting.  In addition, this evidence makes personal attacks on people who don’t agree with the argument, rather than directly supporting the argument itself.","prompt":""},"mc_c6ff4bb5-2e54-8073-8548-5abac14ea8ac":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":2,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Dr. Theresa Moran is a podiatrist, which is a foot doctor. Being a foot doctor does not make someone an expert in agriculture or birth defects.","fixed":false},{"text":"Dr. Theresa Moran’s practice has declined in recent years, and she has fewer and fewer patients.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is irrelevant and attacks Dr. Moran herself rather than the content of her opinion.  It is not an effective way of discrediting an opinion by an expert."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This would be an effective way of discrediting the expert opinion.","prompt":""},"mc_8fa9eed0-eff0-d389-b263-5b6071a2d78b":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":2,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Mr. Aplomb's statement is true, except the ordinance applies only after midnight on weekdays and after 1:00 a.m. on weekends.","fixed":false},{"text":"While local noise ordinances do prohibit making loud noises over a certain decibel level, these laws are unfair and should be repealed.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not a rebuttal of Mr. Aplomb's evidence.  Rather, it is another argument."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"In this rebuttal, Ms. Esprit effectively provides evidence that reveals a gap in Mr. Aplomb's data."}},"rightFloatText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-cktitle\" style=\"color:#025B5B;font-family:lato,sans-serif;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;\">Neighbor sues neighbor</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\"><strong>Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument with evidence:</strong></span><br /><br />Ms. Esprit should not create disturbances with loud parties and noisy animals that make it impossible for me to sleep, because it is reasonable to expect peace and quiet in your own house.<br /><br />Local ordinances prohibit making noises that are above a certain decibel level.&nbsp; Furthermore, when people buy property they expect to be able to enjoy it.&nbsp; Finally, according to the respected Doctor Kronkheit, medical science shows that if people do not get enough sleep, they cannot function in their daily lives.</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>"}
